title: Chapter 9
content: He stepped over and turned the man's face up to the light. The face was bloody and broken, the eyes sightless. It was Harkway. He had been dead long enough to grow cold.

book.title: The Earth Quarter
book.description: 简介： The sun had set half an hour before. Now, from the window of Laszlo Cudyk's garret, he could see how the alien city shone frost-blue against the black sky; the tall hive-shapes that no man would have built, glowing with their own light....
